emailAddress.helpText: Email Address must be in the format username@hostname.tld. Internationalized email addresses are not supported.
emailAddress.label: Email Address
emailAddress.maxLength: Email address must not exceed {{val, number}} characters.
emailAddress.minLength: Email address must be at least {{val, number}} characters.
emailAddress.pattern: Email Address must be in the format username@hostname.tld. Internationalized email addresses are not supported.
emailAddress.tooltip: Email Address is required and will only be used for correspondence purposes. Your data are never shared or sold.

feedback.helpText: Feedback is required and must not consist solely of whitespace.
feedback.label: Feedback
feedback.maxLength: Feedback must not exceed {{val, number}} characters.
feedback.minLength: Feedback must be at least {{val, number}} characters.
feedback.pattern: Feedback must not consist solely of whitespace and may not contain non-printable characters.

name.label: Name
name.maxLength: Name must not exceed {{val, number}} characters
name.pattern: Name must consist solely of text and whitespace.
